name: KohniShogun
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"KohniShogun" tells of a story about a high school student returning to the Age of the Civil Wars by time travel. Your actions will be assessed by the Kokudaka System, a system used in the Edo period to determine land value. This addictive audio novel offers over 100 different endings. Have fun playing this out-of-this-world story!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
??
